```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
set.seed(1)
data("rest_inspec")
inspection_df = 
  rest_inspec %>% 
  select(score, boro, grade, violation_code) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(score), 
         boro != "Missing", 
         grade %in% c("A", "B", "C")) %>% 
  mutate(violation = violation_code) %>% 
  sample_n(5000)
```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Distribution of Inspection Score Across NYC Boroughs

```{r}
inspection_df %>% 
  select(boro, score) %>%
  plot_ly(y = ~score, color = ~boro, type = "box",
          colors = "Set2")
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Letter Grades For Restaurant Inspection Across NYC Boroughs

```{r}
inspection_df %>% 
  select(grade, boro) %>% 
  count(grade, boro) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~grade, y = ~n, color = ~boro, type = "bar", colors = "Set2")
```

### Total Number of Restaurants by Inspection Letter Grade and Score

```{r}
inspection_df %>% 
  select(score, grade) %>% 
  count(score, grade) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~n, y = ~score, color = ~grade, type = "scatter", colors = "Set2")
```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Total Number of Violations by Violation Code

```{r}
inspection_df %>%
  select(violation) %>% 
  count(violation) %>% 
  mutate(violation = fct_reorder(violation, n)) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~violation, y = ~n, color = ~violation, type = "bar", colors = "Set2")
```
